name: Jayjay Jester
description:
Jayjay Jester is an indie point and click horror game developed by SpIcYbEaN666 and FreddyThePro78

In the early 2010s, Jayjay Jester was a popular children's picture book, soon it became a stuffed animal, but it was soon canceled. due to the picture books starting to get creepy.

There are only four existing ones left, your sister had one when she was small, but now you must find out why it became creepy.
